transArray.content: Very good, good service attitude, enthusiastic guidance on surrounding life conditions

Dear, thank you for choosing Hanting Hotel. I am very happy to see such a detailed review from you. I believe you are also a person who is good at observing life and likes to enjoy life. The hotel is working hard to create a better accommodation environment. We attach great importance to the quality of the rooms. Comfort and detail service, our intention is to bring comfort to you who are tired from running around. Remember to follow us and recommend us to your friends. We have added a self-service laundry room and a high-temperature sterilization dryer in the store. Make your journey safer and more convenient. Sincere, friendly and simple looking forward to becoming friends with you
